channel.title: Posts on Of Mu
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Of Mu

item.description: This is my new “about me” site. It’s hosted on an Arch Linux system using Nginx and (as noted in the footer) using Hugo and a theme named Nix provided by one LordMathis. The of-mu.org domain, itself is registered via Gandi.net which is a wonderful domain registrar and the only place I will register my personal domains. Some of the more “web savvy” of you may noticed a green lock in your address bar indicating that this a “secure” site with SSL/TLS enabled.
